author: nigel
msg: HADOOP-2925. Fix HOD to create mapred system directory using a naming convention that will avoid clashes in multi-user shared cluster scenario. Contributed by Hemanth Yamijala.

author: jim
msg: The NIO connector is hard-coded to use the JSSE SSL implementation so just use it directly. This patch allows the JSSE dependency in the SSL abstraction to be removed (this will be in a later patch).

author: jim
msg: As pointed out on the users list, lib is relative to catalina home, not base
